name: {UNUSED} rental Dreadnought
description:
[h1]Log into the game before YYYY-MM-DD to receive:[/h1]
[olist][*]Tier III Royal Navy battleship Dreadnought for 3 days
[*]3 days of Warships Premium Account[/olist]

[b]Details:[/b]
[list][*][b]Dreadnought[/b]: The first of its kind, the Royal Navy's Dreadnought revolutionized the history of shipbuilding. HMS Dreadnought far outmatched all of her predecessors in terms of size and firepower. In the game, as is typical of lower-tier battleships, she sails at an unhurried pace and cannot boast ideal ballistics or gun arrangement. However, owing to the large caliber of Dreadnought's main guns, the ship can pose a real threat to enemy cruisers.
[*][b]Warships Premium Account[/b] offers you the following bonuses:
[list][*]+65% XP per battle
[*]+50% credits per battle
[*]the ability to simultaneously undertake three tasks in World of Warships campaigns[/list][/list]

Please note: this item is not compatible with an account created outside of Steam.

In the game, this maneuverable ship excels at close-range combat, capable of packing a hard punch with her main battery.

Maneuver, change your diving depth, hide from your enemies, and surprise them with stealth attacks from the flanks.[/color]

While we continue configuring the submarines, you're welcome to try them out in Submarine Battles.

Viribus Unitis is the first dreadnought of Austria-Hungary, the lead ship in a series of four battleships, and a veteran of World War I. Shortly before being destroyed by mines set by Italian combat swimmers, she joined the fleet of the State of Slovenes, Croats, and Serbsâ€”the future Yugoslaviaâ€”becoming the first and last Yugoslavian battleship. The ship received her Latin name after the personal motto of Emperor Franz Joseph I: â€œWith united forces.â€ Despite her relatively small size, she had powerful artillery. In World of Warships, she represents Europe.

Please note: this item is only compatible with game accounts created through Steam.
